html: .@ceidotorg's Myron Ebell: "So many species were extinct when they were listed, or listed due to data error. When those data errors are delisted, they're counted as 'recovered'. The ESA in general is a tool for land control, a political tool rather than a species recovery one."pic.twitter.com/O7fBvTpZXy

html: .@RepWesterman: "Outside groups flood the species petition system with thousands of unwarranted or understudied petitions - then sue @Interior when they can't keep up. The PETITION Act preserves legitimate listing processes but prevents those absurdities." #ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/yoQmYwuQqP
text:
.@RepWesterman: "Outside groups flood the species petition system with thousands of unwarranted or understudied petitions - then sue @Interior when they can't keep up. The PETITION Act preserves legitimate listing processes but prevents those absurdities." 

#ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/yoQmYwuQqP

html: .@RepWesterman: "The problem here is the abuse of the Act rather than what the Act was intended to be. ESA is a vital component of our nation's conservation laws. But it's an 8-track law in a Spotify world." #ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/eypIGeerX2
text:
.@RepWesterman: "The problem here is the abuse of the Act rather than what the Act was intended to be. ESA is a vital component of our nation's conservation laws. But it's an 8-track law in a Spotify world." 

#ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/eypIGeerX2

html: .@RepRalphNorman "The goal of the ESA isn't wrong, but I'm a real estate developer. I know if you don't make changes to adapt, you fall behind. The ESA needs to be modernized, and so I'm proud to sponsor the PREDICTS Act." #ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/XtKK0XVufS
text:
.@RepRalphNorman "The goal of the ESA isn't wrong, but I'm a real estate developer. I know if you don't make changes to adapt, you fall behind. The ESA needs to be modernized, and so I'm proud to sponsor the PREDICTS Act."

html: .@RepNewhouse: "The abysmal 3% recovery rate over 45 years - I think that's something we should all be concerned with. But whenever someone talks about reforming ESA, they're instantly called 'radical'. Look at these reforms: they're anything but radical." #ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/Pc7MFp4fee
text:
.@RepNewhouse: "The abysmal 3% recovery rate over 45 years - I think that's something we should all be concerned with. But whenever someone talks about reforming ESA, they're instantly called 'radical'. Look at these reforms: they're anything but radical."

html: .@NatResources Chairman @RepRobBishop: "I don't want to reject the ESA, I want to reform it. The goals ESA sets out are vague, so we can't tell when we have success. It needs to rehabilitate species, not just list them in the Federal Register." #ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/BLrVE6Z5TH
text:
.@NatResources Chairman @RepRobBishop: "I don't want to reject the ESA, I want to reform it. The goals ESA sets out are vague, so we can't tell when we have success. It needs to rehabilitate species, not just list them in the Federal Register."

#ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/BLrVE6Z5TH

html: .@RepMullin "We're going to make meaningful changes to the ESA and cut red tape. The ESA has been implemented backwards, driven by litigation while not making species any safer from extinction." #ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/WuDMRLPjV5
text:
.@RepMullin "We're going to make meaningful changes to the ESA and cut red tape. The ESA has been implemented backwards, driven by litigation while not making species any safer from extinction."

#ModernizeESApic.twitter.com/WuDMRLPjV5
